sourcesContent: import Colors from "Assets/Colors" import Checkbox from "Components/Checkbox" import Text from "Components/Text" import React from "react" import styled from "styled-components" export const TermsOfServiceCheckbox = ({ error, name, onChange, onBlur, value, ...props }) => ( {"I agree to Artsy’s "} Terms of Use {" and "} Privacy Policy {", and to receive emails from Artsy."} ) const StyledCheckbox = styled(Checkbox)` margin: 5px 0; align-items: flex-start; ` const A = styled.a` color: ${props => props.color}; ` export const TOSText = styled(Text)` margin: 0 0 0 5px; line-height: 22px; `
